vulnerability_findings.message:
Reentrancy in Reentrancy_secure.withdrawBalance (patch_2.sol#7-17):
	External calls:
	- require(bool)(msg.sender.call.value(amountToWithdraw)()) (patch_2.sol#14)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- reentrancyLock (patch_2.sol#16)
